EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Americas_Webinar_GoDirect_mih.201809_Americas_MissedYou_Webinar_GoDirect_
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Webcast - GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WE MISSED YOU Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}!
Since you couldn't make our webcast - GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans, here is the presentation slides <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GoDirect_Service_Webcast_101018.pdf]]> and the recording <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/recording/play/lpUXjCOXoqJnj21UoK70l4gcvwlTPAwhge_UIYKg6doJT6qAqKhAuvSXu4wQ2ITZ?startTime=1539183726000]]> for you to review and share with your colleagues.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the next webinars, events, product launches and more!
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
